combinationalAnalysis-input-name-list: Enter Input names separated by commas:
combinationalAnalysis-output-name-list: Enter Output names separated by commas:
combinationalAnalysis-enter-boolean-func: Enter Boolean Function:
combinationalAnalysis-need-decimal-colum: <label class='cb-checkbox'>I need a decimal column.<input id='decimalColumnBox' type='checkbox'></label>
combinationalAnalysis-alert-var-or-boole: Enter Input / Output Variable(s) OR Boolean Function!
combinationalAnalysis-alert-combinationa: Use Either Combinational Analysis Or Boolean Function To Generate Circuit!
tutorials-guide1-description: This is where you can find all the circuit elements that are offered to build amazing circuits.
tutorials-guide2-description: This panel lets you change element properties as they are selected. When no elements are selected, the panel displays project properties.
tutorials-quick-btn-description: This movable panel offers to perform some actions like Save Online, Open, Download quickly. Hover over the icons and see for yourself
tutorials-tabs-bar-description: This section displays all the circuits you have in your project. You can easily add and delete circuits.
tutorials-timing-diagram-panel-descripti: This panel displays the waveform created by circuits and can be used for resolving race conditions and debugging circuits.
tutorials-bug-guide-description: You can report any issues/bugs you face through this issue reporting button there and then quickly.
tutorials-tour-help-description: You can restart this tutorial anytime by clicking on "Tutorial Guide" under this dropdown.
ux-report-issue-success: You've successfully submitted the issue. Thanks for improving our platform.
ux-report-issue-failure: There seems to be a network issue. Please reach out to us at support@ciruitverse.org
circuit-error-delete-current-circuit: At least 2 circuits need to be there in order to delete a circuit.
circuit-alert-dependent-circuit:
The following circuits are depending on $1: $2
Delete subcircuits of $1 before trying to delete $1
circuit-delete-circuit-confirmation:
Are you sure want to delete: $1
This cannot be undone.
engine-cyclic-circuit-detection-error: Simulation Stack limit exceeded: maybe due to cyclic paths or contention
layoutMode-no-space-message: No space. Move or delete some nodes to make space.
restrictedElementDiv-element-restricted-: The element has been restricted by mentor. Usage might lead to deduction in marks
setup-restore-unsaved-data-message: We have detected that you did not save your last work. Don't worry we have recovered them. Access them using Project->Recover
subcircuit-error-insertion-in-wrong-mode: Subcircuit cannot be inserted in this mode
subcircuit-no-other-subcircuit-create-on: Looks like there are no other circuits which doesn't have this circuit as a dependency. Create a new one!
